mapper.insert: insert into user_tbl values( user_tbl_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userLevel}, #{userBirth}, to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{userGender}, #{userAddr}, #{userPoint} )
mapper.select: select user_no as userNo, user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, user_name as userName, user_phone as userPhone, user_level as userLevel, user_birth as userBirth, user_date as userDate, user_gender as userGender, user_addr as userAddr, user_point as userPoint from user_tbl where user_id=#{userId} and user_pw=#{userPw}
select dm_no as dmNo, dm_sender as dmSender, dm_receiver as dmReceiver, dm_contents as dmContents, dm_date as dmDate, dm_check as dmCheck from dm where dm_receiver=#{parameter} and dm_check='읽지않음'
